Blue

Blue is one of the three primary colours in the RYB colour model (traditional colour theory), as well as in the RGB (additive) colour model. [2] It lies between violet and cyan on the spectrum of visible light.The term blue generally describes colours perceived by humans observing light with a dominant wavelength thatâ€™s between approximately 450 and 495 nanometres.
